attributes.action: Increase the proportion of the Defence Budget spent on the British Army and Royal Marines
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current economic climate of our country demands a cut in public spending on our government's part; the one true solution to our recession. However, due to our military commitment to Afghanistan we must appeal to increase the percentage of the annual Budget that is spent specifically on our land-based forces in order to provide them with better equipment and resources.
